name: Tough Movie Trivia: The Crow | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is Eric's first word in the movie?
What doesn't Sarah want on her hot dog?
In what order does the gang die?
questions.explanation:
Tin Tin, Funboy, T-Bird, Skank.

	Tin Tin was stabbed, Funboy was given an injection of heroin to the heart, T-Bird exploded, and Skank got thrown out of a window.

questions.text: Julia Roberts was offered the role of Shelly?

questions.explanation:
Detroit & motor city.

	Evidenced by references to "Motor City".

questions.text: The writer of "The Crow", James O'Barr has a cameo in the movie: what is his character?
questions.explanation:
Looter.

	He steals a TV from Gideon's pawn shop after it explodes.

questions.text: Top Dollar, Myca, and Grange are never referred to by name in the movie?
From what book are T-Bird's final words taken?
Was Christian Slater offered the role of Eric?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Slater had a role in another great film, "True Romance", written by my favorite writer and director, Quentin Tarantino.
